author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MEI Pharma Announces $75 Mln Private Placement
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - MEI Pharma Inc:
* MEI PHARMA ANNOUNCES $75 MILLION PRIVATE PLACEMENT * MEI PHARMA INC - PROCEEDS FROM FINANCING WILL BE USED TO FUND CONTINUED CLINICAL DEVELOPMENT OF MEI-401
* MEI PHARMA INC - COMPANY WILL ISSUE 33 MILLION UNITS AT A PRICE OF ABOUT $2.273 PER UNIT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
